name: 2022 2nd International Conference on Computational Modeling, Simulation and Data Analysis
content: 2022 2nd International Conference on Computational Modeling, Simulation and Data Analysis (CMSDA 2022) will be held during December 2-4, 2022 in Zhuhai, China. It dedicates to creating a platform for academic communications between specialists and scholars in the fields of Modeling, Simulation and Data Analysis. The conference will create a path to establish a research relationship for the authors and listeners with opportunities for collaboration and networking among the universities and institutions for promoting research and developing technologies.
